preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh 60 g of arsenic (As) in a fume hood to ensure safety.  
 2. Weigh 10 g of phosphorus (P) carefully.  
 3. Weigh 140 g of strontium (Sr).  
 4. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the weighed As, P, and Sr thoroughly using a non-reactive spatula to ensure an even mixture.
